data.message: Hey Slim, there is some jerk posing as you putting fake posts on FB that he is going to give away cars and cash to people and he is doing this in your name. I think this is very scummy of whoever it is pretending to be you and smearing your name like they are. Just thought you should know. I hope the real Slim Shady will please stand up and take his good name back and stop that jerk from crushing the holiday spirit of so many. He calls himself slim shady and has put photos of you and your daughter up there but it a fake page. Hope you and your family have a Merry Christmas.
